body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is Richard Baker from XYZ Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kathleen. Could you please provide me with your phone number and email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is seven eight zero five five five two three four one, and my email is kathleen dot miller at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Kathleen. Can you also confirm your home address for us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my address is four five six Maple Street, Anytown, USA.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for confirming. Is there anything else you would like to share with us about your experience so far?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, everything has been resolved regarding the product quality issue. I am feeling relieved now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Kathleen. Thank you for your time today. We appreciate your feedback and assistance. Have a wonderful day!
